At Academy of Music, we offer a broad range of music lessons designed to cater to students of all 
ages and skill levels. Whether youâ€™re a beginner looking to pick up an instrument for the first time 
or an experienced musician aiming to refine your skills, we have the right program for you. 
Academy of Music now offers piano lessons in your home as well as in our studio in S.W. 
Edmonton and online. If you do not own an instrument, we would recommend the Kawai Keyboard 
Club, which includes the loan of a piano! We understand that every student has unique needs and 
preferences, which is why we offer multiple options for music lessons. Whether you prefer in-
person lessons, online instruction, or learning from the comfort of your own home, we have a 
service that will meet your needs.]]></text></topic></topic></map>
